name: Status:New
description: Indicates a freshly reported bug that hasn't been reviewed or triaged yet.

name: Status:Needs Triage
description: Requires validation, prioritization, or assignment by the QA or dev team.

name: Status:Needs Reproduction
description: The bug needs to be reproduced to confirm it is valid and actionable.

name: Status:Confirmed
description: The bug has been reproduced and validated by the QA team.

name: Status:In Progress
description: The bug is actively being worked on by a developer.

name: Status:Blocked
description: Work on the bug cannot proceed due to an external dependency or unresolved issue.

name: Status:Ready for Testing
description: The fix has been implemented and is ready for QA testing.

name: Status:Testing In Progress
description: The bug is actively being worked on by the QA team.

name: Status:Testing Failed
description: QA testing revealed that the fix does not resolve the issue, or it introduced new problems.

name: Status:Testing Passed
description: QA has verified that the fix resolves the issue without introducing new bugs.

name: Status:Fix Ready
description: The fix has been finalized and is awaiting deployment or release.

name: Status:Closed
description: The issue has been resolved and verified, or it is no longer relevant.

name: Status:Won't Fix
description: The issue is acknowledged but deemed low impact or out of scope.

name: Status:Duplicate
description: The issue is a duplicate of another reported bug.

name: Status:Invalid
description: The reported issue is not a bug or cannot be reproduced.
